content.description: A slab walk interrupted by a handful of fifth class moves. A worthy finish to Sunfall.Walk up and left along the slab to reach a right-rising corner below some scary looking, very large boulders. Take this corner to where it dead-ends into a short vertical wall. Up this (crux) to a short right-facing corner on easy slab, continue to a tree belay.
content.location: Begin at the tree island at the top of Sunfall.

content.description: Surmount the rounded off slab (wrestling a small birch) moving left to reach the right-rising crack on the scooped slab. Follow the right-rising crack up the slab, then the left-rising crack it T's into. Top out the crack to reach lower-angle slab (optional belay). Move up the slab (cracks available far right or left for gear) to a tree island with some large pines to belay.
content.location: Locate the large right-facing right-arching corner; downhill and left is the base of this corner. Further down and left, is a rounded off slab with a small ledge at its top. Above this is a scooped slab with a right-rising crack that T's into a left-rising crack.
